Detailed Description

Definition at line 32 of file robot.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CasPlanner::Robot::Robot ( string  name,
double  length,
double  width,
double  narrowDist,
Point  center 
)

Consturctor for the Robot Class.

This constructor take the following Parameters:

Parameters:
name is a string variable representing the Robot's Name.
length is a double variable representing the Length of the Robot.
width is a double variable representing the width of the Robot.
narrowDist is a double variable representing the narrowest distance in the environment. This distance is used to reduce the collision detection between the Robot and the surroundings into a set of points.
center is a Point variable representing the position of the center of rotation of the Robot with respect to the center of Area. This is also used for collision detection.
